News.headline: The Daggers Are Pleased To Support Safer Internet Day 2017
News.page_title: The Daggers Are Pleased To Support Safer Internet Day 2017
News.URL_keywords: The Daggers Are Pleased To Support Safer Internet Day 2017
News.short_description: Join the #SID2017 social media campaign and unite for a better internet!
News.description:
Join the Safer Internet Day Thunderclap to kick start a day of trending and share positive messages to show your support for Safer Internet Day and to help inspire a better internet.

This year we want you to give the internet a smile through our #giveasmile campaign.

You can post a smiley selfie or fill in a specially designed emoji.

You can also join the internet safety emoji charades game. The safer internet team will be posting internet safety tips through emojis and want you to join in the fun.

Find out about how you can get involved in emoji charades on Safer Internet Day!
